newsitem.title: UK: BOXING-HIDE REGAINS WBO CROWN BY BEATING TUCKER.
newsitem.headline: BOXING-HIDE REGAINS WBO CROWN BY BEATING TUCKER.

text.p: Herbie Hide of Britain pounded American Tony Tucker to defeat in the second round to win the vacant World Boxing Association (WBO) title.
The fight was stopped when Hide, the aggressor from the opening bell, knocked Tucker down for the third time in the round.

The victory gave Hide, 25, the title for the second time. He won it in March 1994 by knocking out compatriot Michael Bentt but lost it a year later to American Riddick Bowe, his only defeat in 30 fights.
